Parts.A:
Greetings, Exile!

  Did you hear about the new merchant in town? I have heard he is quite the charmer. Oh, what I would give <...she goes on and on about the new merchant...>

  You wanted something? Well then, out with it!
Parts.B: Food and Drinks;A room;What about Lasho?

Parts.A:
Lasho? A great businessman! His rise to power is quite exciting. He told me the story a few moments after he bought me! You want to hear about it? Oh yes, surely, you would want to hear about it!

  He came to these parts a long time ago, to seek fortune. Him and his personal slave Lillain. Sometimes...sometimes I envy her. The way Lasho looks at her. Don't we all to wish to be admired like that? Perhaps...perhaps one day...

Oh! Right!

  What he told me is that, through a bad business deal, he had acquired quite too many "Immersive Construction Equipment- and Armordisplays". Low quality, self assembly racks to display ones attire. It seems he had found a good market for it somewhere here. Sold all of them at colossol markup. Ingenious, is he not?

  He then branched out to sell weak animals to new owners. Those that were sick. Those that no one wanted, not even as food. And he sold those, too.

  He also told me he got people to invest in his business - without ever paying them back. I...whenever I think about it, I am about to faint. Surely, you know why!
Parts.B: Of course I know! Lasho is a great man!

Parts.A:
An inn room! Well certainly! You can have an inn room. Provided we have space...and you are willing to pay the price!

  Let me tell you about our inn rooms. We have quite a few, here at Mitra's Shame! They come in various sizes, and if you decide to stay a little longer, you may also put down some furniture of your own. Naturally, that will then belong to us...surely, that is not a dealbreaker?

  Do take a look around, see if any of the rooms suit your liking. Those without a sign are free!

  ((Please open a ticket on discord to get your inn room!))
